description: > One type of shrub is a fruit [liqueur](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Liqueur) that was popular in 17th and 18th century England, typically made with [rum](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rum) or [brandy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brandy), and mixed with sugar and the juice or rinds of [citrus](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Citrus)[](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shrub_(drink)#cite_note-CLASSMAG-1) fruit.
